required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of SCH 503034 in Previously Untreated Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Infected With Genotype 1 (Study P03523)
clinical_study.official_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of SCH 503034 in Previously Untreated Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Infected With Genotype 1

brief_summary.textblock: This was an open-label, randomized safety and efficacy trial in adult, treatment-naïve Chronic Hepatitis C (CHC) participants with genotype 1 infection. The study conducted in 2 parts, compared standard-of-care PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg, once weekly [QW]), plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day), for 48 weeks to five treatment paradigms containing boceprevir (SCH 503034) 800 mg thrice a day (TID). The five treatments included boceprevir (BOC) plus standard-of-care for 28 or 48 weeks, with and without a 4-week lead-in with PegIntron (PEG) and ribavirin (RBV), and exploration of PegIntron plus low-dose ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) plus boceprevir for 48 weeks.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study was conducted in 2 parts.
Part 1 of the study had 5 arms using weight based ribavirin 800-1400 mg/day and compared:
- PegIntron and ribavirin for 48 weeks (Arm 1 - Control)
- PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir for 28 weeks (Arm 2)
- Lead-in with PegIntron and ribavirin for 4 weeks followed by PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir for 24 weeks (Arm 3)
- PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir for 48 weeks (Arm 4)
- Lead-in with PegIntron and ribavirin for 4 weeks, followed by PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir for 44 weeks (Arm 5)
Participants from Arm 1 receiving PegIntron and ribavirin that were HCV positive after 24 weeks of treatment had the option to receive boceprevir in combination with PegIntron and ribavirin for an additional 24 weeks. All participants from Arm 1 that started boceprevir after Week 24 formed the crossover arm (Arm 8).
Part 2 of the study assessed the safety and efficacy of low dose ribavirin (400-1000 mg/day) and compared:
- PegIntron, ribavirin (800-1400 mg/day) and boceprevir for 48 weeks (Arm 6)
- PegIntron, low-dose ribavirin (400-1000 mg/day) and boceprevir for 48 weeks (Arm 7)
Follow-up for all participants was up to 72 weeks after randomization.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response (SVR)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From follow-up week (FW) 24 up to end of follow-up (EOF)
primary_outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF had achieved SVR. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with reverse-transcriptase-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) assay, with a lower limit of detection (LLD) of 29 international units/mL (IU/mL). A participant in Arm 2 with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 had detectable HCV-RNA after FW 24. He is not considered to achieve SVR.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With SVR Based on a 4-week lead-in Treatment With PegIntron and Ribavirin
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with SVR (undetectable plasma HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF). To assess the effect of lead-in treatment on SVR, participants with (Arm 3 and Arm 5) or without (Arm 2 and Arm 4) lead-in were pooled. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With SVR Based on Duration of Boceprevir Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with SVR (undetectable plasma HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF). Participants from treatment arms receiving boceprevir for 28-weeks (Arm 2 and Arm 3) were pooled, and those receiving boceprevir for 48-weeks (Arm 4 and Arm 5) were pooled for the analysis. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Negative for HCV-RNA at FW 12
secondary_outcome.description: Participants who had undetectable plasma HCV-RNA at FW 12. Also reported are participants for whom the HCV-RNA values were missing. 36 participant who switched over to Arm 8 from Arm 1, are included in the missing values for Arm 1. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Negative for HCV-RNA at 72 Weeks Post Randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Participants who had undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization are reported. Participants with missing HCV-RNA values at 72 weeks post randomization are also reported. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With an Early Virologic Response (EVR) That Achieved SVR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At TW 12, and at FW 24 up to EOF
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at TW 12 have EVR, and with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) achieved SVR. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 That Achieved SVR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At FW 12 and FW 24 up to EOF
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment-naïve adults with CHC genotype 1 were assigned study medication. Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at 72 Weeks Post Randomization That Achieved SVR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At FW 24 up to EOF and at 72 weeks post randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected an the RT-PCR assay. The lower limit of detection (LLD) was 29 IU/mL.

arm_group.description: Participants treated with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg, once weekly [QW]) and Ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of crossing over to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg, QW), Ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day), and boceprevir (800 mg three times daily [TID]) for 24 additional weeks. The participants that crossed over to receive boceprevir formed Arm 8. The total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 2. PEG + RBV + BOC for 28 Wks (Part I)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (from Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving a lead-in treatment with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks, followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 5. PEG + RBV + BOC (from Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving a lead-in treatment with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks, followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 6. PEG + RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks during Part II of the study. Part II was initiated after participants were fully enrolled for Part I.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
arm_group.description: Participants receiving PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), low-dose ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks (Arm 7) during Part II of the study. Part II was initiated after participants were fully enrolled for Part I.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Arm 8. PEG + RBV + BOC (from Wk 24) for 48 Wks (Part I)
arm_group.description: Participants that started in Arm 1 and had detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of receiving boceprevir (800 mg TID) with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day). Participants that took the option of crossing over to receive PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks constitute Arm 8. The total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

intervention.description: 200 mg capsules taken as 800 mg orally three times daily (TID)

intervention.description: 200 mg capsules in doses of 800 to 1400 mg/day (based on weight) taken orally divided twice daily
intervention.arm_group_label: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
Arm 2. PEG + RBV + BOC for 28 Wks (Part I)
Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (from Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)

intervention.description: 200 mg capsules in doses of 400 to 1000 mg/day (based on weight) taken orally divided twice daily
intervention.arm_group_label: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)

participant_flow.recruitment_details: 765 participants were screened in the study, 598 were randomized of which 3 participants were not treated (Arm 1-7). Participants were assigned to Part I (with standard dosing for ribavirin) or Part II (to explore low-dose ribavirin). All participants that completed or discontinued treatment were scheduled to enter follow-up phase per protocol.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Participants in Arm 1 (Part I) who had detectable Hepatitis C Virus-ribonucleic acid (HCV-RNA) at Treatment Week (TW) 24 were offered boceprevir in addition to PegIntron and ribavirin for an additional 24 weeks of treatment, and switched to a new arm, Arm 8.

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg, once weekly [QW]) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of crossing over to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir (800 mg, thrice a day [TID]) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.title: Arm 2. PEG + RBV + BOC for 28 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.title: Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead-in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.title: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 5. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead-in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.title: Arm 6. PEG + RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 8. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 24) for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Participants that started in Arm 1 and had detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of receiving boceprevir (800 mg TID) with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day). Participants that took the option of crossing over to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks constitute Arm 8. The total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

participants_list.participants: Arm 8 were Arm 1 participants that were positive for HCV-RNA at TW 24 and had the option to switch.

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.title: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 5. PEG + RBV+ BOC (From Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

measure.title: Age
measure.description: Overall age characteristics were displayed for Arm 1 through Arm 7. Participants from Arm 1 (Part I) who had detectable HCV-RNA at TW 24, had the option to switch to a new arm, Arm 8.

measure.title: Sex: Female, Male
measure.description: Overall gender characteristics were displayed for Arm 1 through Arm 7. Participants from Arm 1 (Part I) who had detectable HCV-RNA TW 24, had the option to switch to a new arm, Arm 8.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response (SVR)
outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF had achieved SVR. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with reverse-transcriptase-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) assay, with a lower limit of detection (LLD) of 29 international units/mL (IU/mL). A participant in Arm 2 with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 had detectable HCV-RNA after FW 24. He is not considered to achieve SVR.
outcome.time_frame: From follow-up week (FW) 24 up to end of follow-up (EOF)
outcome.population: Intent-to-Treat (ITT) population: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of any study medication (PegIntron, ribavirin, or boceprevir).

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.title: Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. analysis.method_desc: Adjusted for baseline stratification factors: black versus non-black, and cirrhosis versus no cirrhosis.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.title: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 5. PEG + RBV+ BOC (From Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.title: Arm 6. PEG + RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Participants Negative for HCV-RNA at FW 12
measure.description: Participants who had undetectable plasma HCV-RNA at FW 12. Also reported are participants for whom the HCV-RNA values were missing. 36 participant who switched over to Arm 8 from Arm 1, are included in the missing values for Arm 1. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.
measure.population: Intent-to-Treat (ITT) population: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of any study medication (PegIntron, ribavirin, or boceprevir).

outcome.title: Number of Participants Negative for HCV-RNA at 72 Weeks Post Randomization
outcome.description: Participants who had undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization are reported. Participants with missing HCV-RNA values at 72 weeks post randomization are also reported. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.title: Arm 2. PEG + RBV + BOC for 28 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.title: Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.title: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 5. PEG + RBV+ BOC (From Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.title: Arm 6. PEG + RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Participants Negative for HCV-RNA at 72 Weeks Post Randomization
measure.description: Participants who had undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization are reported. Participants with missing HCV-RNA values at 72 weeks post randomization are also reported. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.

class.title: Missing HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization

outcome.title: Number of Participants With an Early Virologic Response (EVR) That Achieved SVR
outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at TW 12 have EVR, and with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) achieved SVR. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.
outcome.time_frame: At TW 12, and at FW 24 up to EOF
outcome.population: Participants with an early virologic response (EVR).

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)

Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Participants With an Early Virologic Response (EVR) That Achieved SVR
measure.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at TW 12 have EVR, and with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) achieved SVR. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.
measure.population: Participants with an early virologic response (EVR).

outcome.title: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 That Achieved SVR
outcome.description: Treatment-naïve adults with CHC genotype 1 were assigned study medication. Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.
outcome.time_frame: At FW 12 and FW 24 up to EOF
outcome.population: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12.

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 That Achieved SVR
measure.description: Treatment-naïve adults with CHC genotype 1 were assigned study medication. Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 (up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected with an RT-PCR assay. The LLD for the assay was 29 IU/mL.
measure.population: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at 72 Weeks Post Randomization That Achieved SVR
outcome.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected an the RT-PCR assay. The lower limit of detection (LLD) was 29 IU/mL.
outcome.time_frame: At FW 24 up to EOF and at 72 weeks post randomization

group.title: Arm 1. PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.title: Arm 3. PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.title: Arm 4. PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Arm 7. PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Participants With a Virologic Response at 72 Weeks Post Randomization That Achieved SVR
measure.description: Participants with undetectable HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization that achieved SVR (have undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 24 up to EOF) are reported. Participants missing data at FW 24 were considered to achieve SVR if he/she had undetectable HCV-RNA at FW 12 or later if he/she returned later to the study center and had undetectable HCV-RNA. HCV-RNA in plasma samples was detected an the RT-PCR assay. The lower limit of detection (LLD) was 29 IU/mL.

class.title: HCV-RNA negative at 72 weeks post randomization
Missing HCV-RNA at 72 weeks post randomization

group.title: PEG +RBV for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 1. PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg, once weekly [QW]) plus ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 48 weeks. • Participants with detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of crossing over to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir (800 mg, thrice a day [TID]) for 24 additional weeks. Total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks. Adverse events for 36 participants after they crossed over to Arm 8 are not included.

group.title: PEG + RBV + BOC for 28 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 2. Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 28 weeks.

group.title: PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 24 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 3. PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead-in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 24 weeks.

group.title: PEG +RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 4. Boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 4) for 44 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 5. PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for 4 weeks lead-in followed by boceprevir (800 mg TID) plus PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW) and ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) for up to 44 weeks.

group.title: PEG + RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: Arm 6. PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: PEG +Low-dose RBV + BOC for 48 Wks (Part II)
group.description: Arm 7. PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (400 to 1000 mg/day) and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: PEG + RBV + BOC (From Wk 24) for 48 Wks (Part I)
group.description: Arm 8. Participants that started in Arm 1 and had detectable HCV-RNA levels after 24 weeks of treatment had the option of receiving boceprevir (800 mg TID) with PegIntron (1.5 μg/kg QW), ribavirin (800 to 1400 mg/day). Participants that took the option of crossing over to receive 24 weeks of PegIntron, ribavirin, and boceprevir (800 mg TID) for 24 additional weeks constitute Arm 8. The total treatment duration was up to 54 weeks.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Principal Investigator agrees to provide to the sponsor thirty (30) days prior to submission for publication or presentation, review copies of abstracts or manuscripts for publication (including slides and texts of oral or other public presentations and texts of any transmission through any electronic media) that report any results of the study.
